traits.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The hybrid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The hybrid can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hybrid makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
